column2:
Step 2/3: 
Add content to the sheet on the right.

You can now fill in your copied sheet with images, GIFs, links, text, numbers etc. Please do not mix images and GIFs with text in the same column. Add as many rows of content as you like and remember you can return to this sheet at any time to edit, add and remove content.     

To add an image or GIF simply find one you like online right click on the image, select "copy image address" and paste the url into the sheet.

You can add hyperlinks to any of the content in the sheet. Just paste the link into the corresponding "link" column.
